Name: AppGameKit Studio
About the game: AppGameKit Studio is a fully featured game development tool set. We’ve re-imagined the game development user interface with an all-in-one work space. You can now quickly drag & drop assets to visualise your scenes, code with AppGameKit Script, easily browse app media, run live debugging sessions, access online help and lots more. AppGameKit Studio allows you, in a few easy clicks, to quickly publish your games to Steam, iOS, Android and a host of other places! Get your apps and games in front of millions of potential players and make yours the next big hit. Features IDE Designed and built from the ground up to fully support the AppGameKit Script language - edit multiple projects at any one time and set the layout that suits your workflow EDITING Powerful editing tools help you code fast and efficiently - such as auto complete command help to the handy sandbox mode where you can quickly try out code tests COMPILING With a fast development and testing environment, you can code your apps once and then compile them almost instantly for testing on desktop or broadcast over wifi to your mobile devices HELP Help is always at hand with the new integrated help window. The integrated search makes it a cinch to find the advice you need from the hundreds of documented commands. You can even drag & drop commands from help directly into your source code space! DEBUGGER Easily find and fix bugs by using the new live debugging features and the extensive watch list support ASSET BROWSER Visualise and manage your media assets with the asset browser window - view media such as images, 3D models and text files and listen to sound and music files SHADERS Deeper shader integration with editing and testing of shaders within the editor - OpenGL shaders and Vulkan shaders are fully supported VULKAN A new Vulkan rendering graphics engine will bring improved speed performance to your apps and will bring improved speed performance, modernisation and future proofing to your apps MULTI-PLATFORM Develop your apps on PC, Mac or Linux devices and then export them to run on PC, Mac, Linux, iOS and Android platforms. SCENE EDITOR With an integrated Scene Editor, it’s a cinch to drag & drop 2D assets to build up and visualise the scenes in your app. It takes the guess work out of coding and shows you instantly a true representation of how your app will look across multiple device resolutions
